name: Poop Spotter ~ The game to improve the quality of poop~
name_original: Poop Spotter ~ The game to improve the quality of poop~
description:
This is a "spot the difference" game with poop.

You are an employee of a poop factory and your job is to ensure the quality of the poop produced.
Compare the poop flowing on the conveyor belt with a sample of acceptable poop and remove all the defective poop you found!

The flow of play is as follows.

1.Many poo-shaped characters flow down the conveyor belt.
2.The poo-shaped characters are randomly given various colors and shapes.
3.You compare them one by one with the previously given sample.
4.If it is the same shape as the sample, it is an accepted product and you don't have to do anything.
5.If the shape is different from the sample, it is defective and you need to remove it immediately by clicking the mouse.
6.The type of accepted product will be changed periodically and the time allowance will decrease as the days go by.
7.Repeat the above steps, and if you can continue to work for 5 days in game time without making a mistake, you have cleared the level.
8.The game is over if the player fails to remove defective products or discards accepted products.

There are four levels in this game.

1.A level in which the player monitors one slow production line.
2.A level in which the player monitors one fast production line.
3.A level in which the player monitors two production lines.
4.A level in which the player monitors four production lines.

Once all levels are completed, an endurance mode with no day limit will be unlocked.
This game will test your split-second judgment and memory.


*** Additional elements only for the Steam version ***

1.Endurance mode is available when you complete the game.
2.Steam Achievements can be obtained.
